name: smart-team-formation
description: AI-powered student grouping system for optimal team formation

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && python convert_levels.py && cd student_team_clustering && python cluster_students.py

author: Smart Team Formation Team
